alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 11:12PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calhoun, northern Roane and east central Jackson Counties through 1145 PM EST... At 1111 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spencer, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Grantsville, Arnoldsburg, Reedy, Millstone, Orma, Statts Mills, Big Springs, Mount Zion, Annamoriah and Gay. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 128 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
